Title: Grand Master Trixxy
Description: Word around the master tamers in Kalimdor is you're the new hotshot that's making such a buzz. Why don't you come down to my training grounds in the Ice Thistle Hills in Winterspring so I can show you how it's done?
ObjectivesText: Defeat Stone Cold Trixxy in a pet battle.
PortraitGiverText: Think you've got what it takes?
